text: Eric Kiptanui (born 19 April 1990) is a Kenyan long-distance runner who specializes in road running. In 2018 he won the Lisbon Half Marathon in 1:00:05. He also won the Berlin Half Marathon, and set a course record with 58:42 min. At the time, it was the fourth fastest half marathon time ever. He also won the Barcelona Half Marathon in 2019. ==Personal bests== *1500 metres – 3:37.73 (Nairobi 2016) *10,000 metres – 28:17.1h (Nairobi 2018) *10 kilometres – 27:34 (Madrid 2017) *15 kilometres – 43:48 (Heerenberg 2018) *Half marathon – 58:42 (Berlin 2018) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Kenyan male long-distance runners
title: Eric Kiptanui
